function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Concerns about the quality of online teaching","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of non-contact interaction activities during covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low satisfaction with non-contact interaction activities may deter people from adopting virtual services and continuing to use traditional medical facilities.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unwillingness to continue using non-contact services post-epidemic can hinder the development of virtual community spaces and impede disease containment efforts.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the concept of 15-10-5-min community life circle","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Mixed online and offline questionnaires leading to data inconsistencies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of transmission due to non-contact interactions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-contact interaction activities and virtual community spaces may impact the spatial structure of urban communities and the behavioral activities of residents, potentially leading to the neglect of other influencing factors.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting the impact of covid-19 on community lifestyle changes","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on non-contact interactive activities leading to social isolation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The impact of virtual space on traditional lifestyles and spatial organization of society","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-contact interaction activities and virtual information networks undermining physical transportation networks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 accelerating the impact of virtual space on residents’ lifestyles and causing changes in the use of community service facilities","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of non-contact interaction on urban space","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on non-contact interaction activities during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weakening of geographic distance due to technology","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased dependence on the internet due to covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of ’non-contact' interaction","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid growth of internet users in china","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of non-contact interaction applications for urban community development","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of non-contact interactions in community planning","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Outbreak of coronavirus disease 2019 covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral shedding in stool as a potential route of transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination in field-settings with sars-cov-2","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through close contact and droplet secretions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support from who in 2003","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of uncontrolled mass travel during holidays","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear health messaging","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time public communications mostly in mandarin chinese and sign language, limited communication in different languages for non-taiwanese citizens","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Permitting the docking of the diamond princess cruise ship with confirmed infections onboard, leading to public panic and concern about community spread","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and lack of education on contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hoarding masks and medical supplies","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of border control and case identification leading to unmonitored spread of contagious diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation leading to public anxiety and confusion","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disease stigma and compassion for affected individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to mainland china and high number of flights increase the risk of covid-19 transmission to taiwan.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Constant alert and readiness to act on epidemics arising from china since the 2003 sars epidemic.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relative narrow disinfection spectrum and complex impact factors","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious and pathological wastes leading to disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disinfection of hospital wastes and wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of contaminated wastewater and sludge as agricultural fertilizer","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chlorine disinfection in hospital wastewater may result in chlorine-resistant
